name: SpeedPunk VR
description:
This game is a prototype, but will be improved. :)

Controls Main Menu: -> Please enter your name

right trigger - point (select menu)
left trigger - teleporter
right - joystick turn
left/right back trigger - grab objects ( green boxes)

Controls Racing:

head tilt -> turn
left trigger -> break
right trigger -> speed up
Y -  go back to the main menu

Roadmap:
https://trello.com/b/WIkx1rwv/speedpunk-vr
